name: Session Management Plugin
description: A pair of slash commands that maintain context between Claude Code sessions through automatic session documentation. Eliminates the need to manually explain what you were working on when starting a new session.

commands.name: tidyup
commands.description: End-of-session cleanup that commits work and creates a structured session summary

commands.name: tidydown
commands.description: Start-of-session context loader that reads previous session summary

changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with tidyup and tidydown commands
